New Records: Reed Sheppard scored a career-high 12 points against the Chicago Bulls
Key Match Events: Reed Sheppard blocked Jalen Smith's layup and another layup from Julian Phillips
Reed Sheppard made a 25-footer off a kick-out pass from Jock Landale
Reed Sheppard stuffed Talen Horton-Tucker's shot near the rim
Post-Match Reflections: Reed Sheppard's scoring surge in the fourth quarter against the Chicago Bulls gave him a new career-high
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets won the game by a dominating margin
